Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Level Description: Proficient (shows most elements clearly and correctly)
CAN: The student can draw two students using a string telephone to communicate over a distance.
The student can clearly illustrate the string telephone, showing how it connects the two students.
The student can show that the string is stretched tight between the students to demonstrate effective communication.
The student can include labels or notes that indicate the use of sound to send and receive information through the string.
The student can use arrows or symbols to show the direction of sound travel from one cup to the other.
CANNOT: The student may inconsistently label elements that show the importance of communication technology in daily life (e.g., may include items like a mobile phone without clear explanation or relevance).

The student might not fully incorporate elements that demonstrate how this system allows people to communicate over distances, such as omitting labels indicating sound distances or environments where this might be used.
